name: @steipete/terminator-mcp
description: MCP plugin to manage macOS terminal sessions.

scripts.build:swift: echo "Placeholder: Build Swift CLI and copy to swift-bin. Example: (cd ../swift-cli && swift build -c release --arch arm64 --arch x86_64 --product terminator -Xswiftc -static-stdlib && mkdir -p ../npm-package/swift-bin && cp .build/apple/Products/Release/terminator ../npm-package/swift-bin/terminator)"
scripts.build: npm run build:swift && npm run build:ts

author: @steipete
